moodish.comm

Interface ClientComm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientCommDummy

    public interface ClientComm
    Communication interface for Moodish clients. Moodish clients must communicate with a MoodishServer exclusively through this interface.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    alc

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        void connect(java.lang.String host,
           java.lang.String nickname)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Establish a connection to a Moodish server. This method should be the first one called by the client as no other operation (expect for isConnected()) can be performed before a connection to the server has been established.
        Parameters:
        host - Address of the server. For instance "localhost", "192.168.1.1", and so on.
        nickname - The nickname to use for the client.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Thrown if the host cannot be found.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if a connection cannot be established.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Check if currently connected to a host.
        Returns:
        true if currently connected to a host, false otherwise.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect from a Moodish server. Any sockets should be closed immediately. Pending messages are not guaranteed to be delivered before disconnecting.

      • getNextMessage

        ClientSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Get the next message received from the server. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message has been received. If no message will ever be received (connection is down), null is returned.
        Returns:
        The next message sent by the server to the client or null if no message will ever be received (disconnected from server).

      • hasNextMessage

        boolean hasNextMessage()
        Check if a message from the server is pending. If hasNextMessage() returns true, a call to getNextMessage() will return immediately with the oldest message in the queue. If hasNextMessage() returns false, a call to getNextMessage() will block until a message has been received.
        Returns:
        true if a message from the server is currently pending, otherwise false.

      • sendMoodishMessage

        void sendMoodishMessage(java.lang.String moodishMessage)
        Send a Moodish message from this client to the server which should then relay the message to all freinds.
        Parameters:
        moodishMessage - The Moodish message to be sent.

      • friendship

        void friendship(java.lang.String nickname)
        Request to be friend of another client.
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the client that should be friend.

      • unfriendship

        void unfriendship(java.lang.String nickname)
        Request to unfriend of a client.
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the client currently friend that should be unfriended.
